text: Hi, everyone. Is there a way to get data from a hubdb without reloading the page? with Ajax. I cant find a propper guideline. I'm totally new to Ajax. I was building a page based on this example - <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/tutorials/how-to-build-a-real-estate-listing-with-hubdb> , so is it possible to make these filters work without page reload?
Check the pinned post in <#CBA9UA4EN|javascript> . There are JS clients you can use

i'm running one with about 50 columns and it's moving suuuuper slow. my marketers are getting tired of using it and I won't let them do an import in the fear that they will break things that already read the DB.
<@U22PJPGK0> ideas: filter instead of search, sort by any column
50 columns shouldn't be unreasonable. We have tables with over 200. Can you shoot me a link to your table?
